snippet: An under secretary to Prime Minister Mario Monti resigned after a report that he had vacationed in 2007 and 2008 as the guest of two businessmen later implicated in a corruption investigation.
abstract: Carlo Malinconico, under secretary to Italian Prime Min Mario Monti, resigns following reports that he had taken lavish vacations as a guest of two businessmen later implicated in a corruption investigation.
lead_paragraph: An under secretary to Prime Minister Mario Monti resigned after a report that he had vacationed in 2007 and 2008 as the guest of two businessmen later implicated in a corruption investigation.
